fields.name: See a Movie
fields.description: Go see a new film or a beloved classic at your local movie theater, independent cinema, or drive-in.

fields.name: Attend a Concert
fields.description: See a gig at your local concert hall. If you don't have one or don't want to see any of the larger touring acts, check out a smaller local venue to hear some of the talented musicians in your area!

fields.name: Visit a Museum or Gallery
fields.description: Spend a day seeing the exhibits at your local museum or art gallery.

fields.name: Watch a Sports Game
fields.description: Cheer on your favorite team or go see a sport that you know little about to learn how it's played!

fields.name: Beach Day
fields.description: Grab your swimsuit and sunscreen and spend a day at the Beach. Build a sand castle, go snorkeling, or try your hand at surfing! No Beach nearby? Relax at a local pool for a similar sand-free experience.

fields.name: Target Practice
fields.description: Improve your accuracy by visiting your local firearms or archery Range, or check out an axe throwing range for an additional arm workout.

fields.name: Visit a Fun Park
fields.description: Unleash your inner child at a nearby Amusement Park or Water Park.

fields.name: Explore the Paranormal
fields.description: Investigate the Unexplained on a local ghost tour or see a psychic to have your fortune told. Check out a haunted house for an extra fright when in season!

fields.name: Try a New Restaurant
fields.description: Go to a restaurant you've never been to before or try a new style of cuisine that you've never had. Remember to call ahead in case you need a reservation!

fields.name: Spend time with Animals
fields.description: Learn about the creatures of our natural world at your local zoo, aquarium, or educational animal center. No animal attractions near you? Consider visiting a local animal shelter for a tour or volunteer opportunities.

fields.name: Enjoy the Performing Arts
fields.description: Plays, musicals, dance, recitals, magic and more, there's something for everyone at the local performing arts theatre!

fields.name: Try an Adventure Sport
fields.description: skydiving, bungee jumping, white water rafting, zip lining, Scuba Diving there's lots of ways to get an adrenaline rush on an adventure sports tour! Perhaps a little too much of a rush? Try a high ropes course, trampoline park, or indoor rock climbing gym.

fields.name: Climb a Mountain
fields.description: See the landscape stretch out beneath you from the top of a nearby mountain. Enjoy a seasonal sport at a mountain resort such as Sking, Snowboarding, or Mountain Biking

fields.name: Go Camping
fields.description: Return to nature and spend some quality time in the great outdoors!

fields.name: See a Comedy Show
fields.description: Have your funny bone tickled at a local comedy or improv show!

fields.name: Festival
fields.description: Whether it's a street fair, open air market, or seasonal celebration, get out in the crowd and enjoy the local festivities!

fields.name: Get out on the Water
fields.description: Explore your local waterways. Kayaks, canoes, speedboats, jet ski's, there's lots of ways to float and enjoy the waves!

fields.name: Dancing
fields.description: Get out and a shake your tailfeathers at a local ballroom, studio, or club!

fields.name: Escape Room
fields.description: See if you've got what it takes to escape in a local escape room game!

fields.name: Mini Golf
fields.description: See if you can get around the obstacles at your local minigolf course. Loser buys the ice cream!

fields.name: Bowling
fields.description: Hit the lanes at your local alley and try to stay out of the gutters!

fields.name: Botanical Garden
fields.description: Enjoy the exotic plants at your local botanical garden

fields.name: Karaoke
fields.description: Belt out your favorite tunes in a night at karaoke!

fields.name: Skating
fields.description: Skating, ice skating, rollerblading, or skateboarding, find a place to test your balance

fields.name: Farm
fields.description: Go to a pick your own farm or get some local produce at the local farmers market

fields.name: Rock Climbing
fields.description: Get vertical at your local rock climbing gym!

fields.name: Take a Class
fields.description: Find a new hobby by trying a local class! Art, Dance, Cooking, there's always something new to learn!

fields.name: Lookout
fields.description: Find a local lookout and watch the sunset. Stick around when it gets dark to do a little stargazing!

fields.name: Spa Day
fields.description: Relax, you've earned it! Pamper yourself at a local spa!

fields.name: Horseback Riding
fields.description: Go for a romantic ride or visit a ranch to take lessons!

fields.name: Shopping
fields.description: Get your partner and yourself some new clothes. If the closet's too full, go to one of your favorite hobby stores and see what's new in stock!

fields.name: Go to the Park
fields.description: Take a walk, ride your bike, or play some local sports at the park

fields.name: Las Vegas Night
fields.description: Pretend your in Las Vegas and spice up the night the way

fields.name: Go Drink
fields.description: See how it's made at your local Brewery or Winery

fields.name: Up in Smoke
fields.description: Visit a local hookah bar, cigar lounge, or dispensary

fields.name: Local Bar
fields.description: Try your hand at bar games or pub trivia, find a local speakeasy, or make a night out of it with a bar crawl

fields.name: Take to the Skies
fields.description: Whether its a private plane, helicopter, hot air balloon, see the world from a birds eye view!

fields.name: Stay Home
fields.description: You have a busy enough life, use this night to stay in. Get your favorite takeout and spend some quality time doing the things you love
